name: BlueFlyingBird
description:
Hello guys!! in another new project inspired from the "flappy bird" we all know that mobile famous game so I inspired from it my own project with a different look I really hope you like it. i just made the game for you to try it that's just a test version, It's still under development I wanna add many new things to it and if you like it i would be really thankful for you if you can give me your opinion about it in the comments  or some new ideas that you wanna see in the new version of this game 
ENJOY <3
I really appreciate all of your support and help, and if you can donate me to keep working on the project and coming up with new ideas that really would be so helpful from you !!
